name: Skinny Zucchini Alfredo
description: Oodles of zoodles! We love using fresh zucchini to make a low-carb pasta dish. Best of all, the whole dish is prepared in the microwave – less mess and less stress!
preparation: In a Multipurpose Steamer combine mix with milk. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 4–5 min,  or until thickened, whisking halfway through.
Add zucchini noodles, broccoli and peas. Gently toss to mix.
Cover and microwave on high 1–2 min, or until veggies are tender. Top with cheese, as desired.
tips: Add fresh avocado on top for even more green.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed greens, 1⁄2 cup chickpeas and 1 tsp Epicure dressing.

products.name: Alfredo Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Luxurious, creamy sauce for pasta, seafood, fish, and chicken.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
